activities:
As a data controller, KIXEYE Inc. processes personal data relating to employees and individual contacts of corporate customers, suppliers, service providers and other corporate business partners in the EEA.

As a data processor, KIXEYE Inc. provides web hosting and technical services for KIXEYE B.V., and in this context, KIXEYE Inc. processes personal data from users of KIXEYE B.V.'s game platform within the EU and EEA on behalf of, and as a data processing service provider for, KIXEYE B.V., which controls such data and processing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU/EEA Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
